document_data.name: Suzale
document_data.mainbody: '''Suzale''', also known as '''Purple Dragon ale''', was a fine-quality nutty [[ale]].
document_data.Availability:
Apart from [[Suzail]], Purple Dragon ale was a staple at [[Hultail]]'s the [[High Helm]] festhall.

The [[Jovial Juggler]] of [[Beregost]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] offered Suzale to its patron for a meager single [[gold]] [[coin]] per serving.

In the [[Dalelands]], suzale cold be found in the [[Silver Taproom]] of [[Essembra]] for six [[copper]] pieces.

The [[Golden Goblet]] tavern in the [[Calimport/Trades District|Trades District]] of [[Calimport]] saved imported Purple Dragon Ale.
document_data.Prices:
*A hand keg for 3 sp
*A cask for 2 gp
*A barrel for 5 gp
*A [[wikipedia:English wine cask units|butt]] for 15 gp
*A [[wikipedia:English wine cask units|tun]] for 30 gp
document_data.History:
The ale was first brewed for King [[Azoun IV]] of [[Cormyr]] but over time it became sold across [[Faerûn]]. The name was a pun on the city of Suzail, the seat of power in Cormyr.

Suzale was served at a reception for the [[Merchants' Guild]] held in the [[Sheaf of Wheat]] inn in [[Ghars]], Cormyr, on [[Eleint 19]] in the {{YearlinkName|1367}}. [[Jasper (servant)|Jasper]] suspected Mayor [[Tobald]] had had several mugs of either Suzale or [[Elminster's Choice]].
document_data.Cultural Significance: ''[[The Purple Dragons' Goblin Joke Scroll]]'' was a collection of anecdotes about [[goblin]]s. One such joke on the popular scroll included a goblin who imbibed suzale.
